item.description:
CLASS IS RESCHEDULED TO 12/11, TUESDAY NIGHT.  INSTRUCTOR NOT ABLE TO MEET TONIGHT. 

Cost of class is $30, cash or check at time of class, payable to Lolita Demers.  Put together your own glass designs for jewelry.  You can use your imagination. Glass has to be fired & cooled, so will be available once completed.  Can be ready to pickup before Christmas. 

Can be made into keychains, earrings, pendants, etc.  Great for gifts.   

I apologize for the short notice!
item.how_to_find_us: Art Studios, up the path from the Lowell Visitor Center/Art Studio tel 978-459-7819

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Fused Glass Jewelry Class
